Key concepts

The VAMToolbox is composed of geometries, projectors, optimization, and digital light processing (DLP).

Geometry

The VAMToolbox.geometry module contains classes to organize flow of data within the toolbox.

  • VAMToolbox.geometry.TargetGeometry is used to hold the voxelized target. It is passed into the optimization function.

  • VAMToolbox.geometry.ProjectionGeometry holds data about the type of projector used, the projection angles, the inclination angle for laminographic geometries, etc. It is passed into the optimization function.

  • VAMToolbox.geometry.Sinogram

  • VAMToolbox.geometry.Reconstruction

Projectors

VAMToolbox.Projector

Optimization

VAMToolbox.Optimizer

Digital light processing
